snippet: The suspect, who was armed with a sword or large knife, struck a working-class neighborhood in the city of Trollhattan. He was fatally shot by police.
abstract: Swedish police fatally shoot man who killed teacher and student with large blade at school in southwestern city of Trollhattan; Swedes are stunned by violent school attack, which is exceedingly rare in country; suspect, town resident, had no criminal record, and no motive is known.
lead_paragraph: The suspect, who was armed with a sword or large knife, struck a working-class neighborhood in the city of Trollhattan. He was fatally shot by police.

headline.print_headline: Sweden Stunned as Man Kills 2 and Wounds Others at a School
headline.main: Sweden Stunned as Man Kills 2 and Wounds Others at a School
